titleStmt.title: None but Christ, none but Christ Intimating, that in Him, who is the Lord of Lords, and Prince onely, is to be found, the full and absolute cure of mans misery.
titleStmt.author: Cotton, Clement.

editionStmt.edition: The fifth edition, with some new additions.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Io. Beale for Na. Newbery, and are to sold at the Star in Popes head Alley,

notesStmt.note: "The sicke mans A.B.C. In questions and answers." has separate dated title page; register is continuous.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: the Star in Popes head Alley
